column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ nda no mu no
column3: mbra bi fii Kaesar Augustus hɔ baa dɛ wɔnkan wiadze nyina nkyerɛw hɔn edzin."

column2: "Iyi nye ɔkankyerɛw asɔpɔn no a wɔyɛɛ no ber a Kerinius dzi Siria ambrado no."
"Na nyimpa nyina kɔr hɔnara hɔn nkurow mu dɛ wɔnkyerɛw hɔn dzin."
"Na Josef so fii Galilii
column3: wɔ Nazarɛt kurow no mu
column5: David kurow a wɔfrɛ no Bɛtlɛhɛm no mu
column6: osiandɛ ofi David fie nye n'ebusua mu ntsi
column8: "ama wɔaakan ɔno nye n'esiyer Mary a ne yafun no enyin no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: wɔwɔ hɔ no
column4: ne nda a ɔsɛ dɛ ɔdze wo durii."

column2: "Na ɔwoo n'abakan banyimba
column3: na ɔdze adasoe kyekyeer no ho
column4: na ɔdze no too mbowa edzidzidaka mu
column5: osiandɛ ɔkwan nnyi ahɔhodan no mu ma hɔn."

column2: "Nna nguanhwɛfo bi wɔ ɔman no ara mu
column3: da haban mu roweɔn hɔn nguankuw anadwe."

column2: "Na Ewuradze bɔfoe begyinaa hɔn nkyɛn
column3: na Ewuradze n'enyimnyam hyerɛnee bɔɔ hɔn ho aprɔw

column2: "Na ɔbɔfo no see hɔn dɛ
column3: Mma hom nnsuro; na hwɛ
column4: mebrɛ hom nsɛmpa a ɔyɛ dɛw kɛse a ɔbɛyɛ aman nyina dze
column6: "na ndɛ wɔawo Agyenkwa ama hom wɔ David kurow mu

column2: "Na iyi nye hom asɛnkyerɛdze: hom bohu abofra bi dɛ ɔkyekyer adasoe mu da mbowa edzidzidaka mu."
"Na awerɛfir mu ara ɔsor dɔm pii bɛkaa ɔbɔfo no ho yii Nyankopɔn ayɛw see dɛ
column5: Na asomdwee nka nyimpa a wɔsɔ n'enyi wɔ asaase do."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ abɔfo no fii hɔn nkyɛn kɔr sor no
column3: nguanhwɛfo no sesee hɔnho dɛ
column4: Hom mma yɛnkɔ Bɛtlɛhɛm nkɔhwɛ dza ɔaba a Ewuradze eyi akyerɛ hɛn yi."

column2: "Na wɔbaa ntsɛntsɛm
column3: na wobohun Mary nye Josef nye abofra no dɛ ɔda mbowa edzidzidaka mu."

column2: "Na wobohun no no
column3: wɔkaa asɛm a wɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn wɔ abofra no ho no ma ɔtahyee."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔtsee nyina
column3: dza nguanhwɛfo no kaa kyerɛɛ hɔn no yɛɛ hɔn nwanwa."

column2: "Na Mary dze
column3: ɔdze nsɛm yi nyina siei
column4: na ɔdween ho wɔ n'akoma mu."

column2: "Na nguanhwɛfo no sanee kɔree kɛhyɛɛ Nyankopɔn enyimnyam na woyii no ayɛw wɔ dza wɔtsee na wokohunii dɛ mbrɛ wɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn nyina tse no."
"Na ndaawɔtwe durii a worubotwa no twatsia no
column3: wɔtoo no dzin JESUS
column4: dɛ mbrɛ bɔfo no dze too no ana woribenyinsen no yafun mu no."

column2: "Na hɔn ahoguar da no durii dɛ mbrɛ Moses mbra se no
column3: wɔdze no kɔr Jerusalɛm dɛ wɔdze no rekɛkyɛ Ewuradze

column2: "dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no Ewuradze ne mbra mu dɛ
column3: Banyimba biara a obobue awotoa ano no

column2: "na wɔakɔbɔ afɔr dɛ mbrɛ wɔkaa no Ewuradze mbra no mu no
column3: Ntamram ebien

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: ɔbarimba bi wɔ Jerusalɛm a ne dzin dze Simeon; na ɔyɛ nyimpa nyamesuronyi a ɔtsen
column5: na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn wɔ no do."

column2: "Na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn yii kyerɛɛ no dɛ onnkohu wu gyedɛ oehu Ewuradze ne Kraest no ana."
"Na Sunsum no dze no baa asɔrdan no mu: ber a abofra Jesus n'awofo dze no baa dɛ wɔrebɛyɛ mbrɛ mbra no n'atɔrmuadze tse ama no no."
"Nna Simeon faa no too n'abaw mu
column3: yii Nyankopɔn ayɛw na afei ɔkaa dɛ
column6: nkyii gya w'akowaa kwan asomdwee mu

column2: "Osiandɛ m'enyiwa ehu wo nkwagye a"
"Esiesie wɔ amanaman nyina enyim;"
"Ɔkandzea a ɔbɛma amanamamfo do atsew
column3: Na wo man Israel enyimnyam."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ abofra no n'egya nye ne na nwanwa wɔ dza wɔkaa no wɔ no ho no ho;"
"na Simeon hyiraa hɔn
column3: na ɔsee ne na Mary dɛ
column5: oyi na wɔdze no esi hɔ ama Israel mu dodowara hɔn asehwe nye hɔn soɛr
column6: ɔnye asɛnkyerɛdze a wɔbɛkasa etsia no;"

column2: "ama akoma dodowara mu adwen aada edzi
column3: na ɔwoara so nkrantsee bohwira w'akoma mu."

column2: "Nna Anna
column3: ɔbaa nkɔnhyɛnyi bi a ɔyɛ Fanuel babaa a ofir Aser ebusuakuw mu wɔ hɔ: oenyin
column4: na ɔwaar ne nkataasiaber mu nye no kun tsenaa mfe esuon
column6: "na ɔayɛ okunafo bɛyɛ mfe eduowɔtwe anan
column8: na ɔdze akɔnkyen nye mpaabɔ som Nyankopɔn adzekyee nye adzesaa."

column2: "Na dɔn no ara mu
column3: no so bae beyii Nyankopɔn ayɛw
column4: na ɔkaa no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ hɔn a wɔrotweɔn dɛ wɔbɔpon Jerusalɛm no nyina."

column2: "Na wowiee dza Ewuradze mbra se nyina yɛ no
column3: wɔsanee kɔr hɔnankasa hɔn kurow Nazarɛt a ɔwɔ Galilii mu."

column2: "Na abofra no nyinii
column3: na ɔyɛɛ ndam
column5: na Nyankopɔn adom wɔ no do."

column2: "Na n'awofo no kɔr Jerusalɛm afe nyina wɔ apaho afahyɛ no mu."
"Na odzii mfe duebien no
column3: wɔkɔr Jerusalɛm dɛ mbrɛ afahyɛ n'atɔrmuadze tse
column5: "na wodzii nda no wiei na wɔresan akɔ no
column6: abofra Jesus no kaa ekyir wɔ Jerusalɛm a nna n'egya nye ne na dze

column2: "na wosusuu dɛ ɔafora dɔm no mu ntsi
column3: wɔnantseew dakor kwansin na wɔkɔhwehwɛɛ no wɔ hɔn ebusuafo nye hɔn amanyimfo mu;"

column2: "na woennhu no no
column3: wɔsanee kɔr Jerusalɛm kɔhwehwɛɛ no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ne ndaansa durii no
column3: wokohun no wɔ asɔrfi no mu dɛ ɔtse akyerɛkyerɛfo no finimfin
column4: oritsie hɔn na oribisabisa hɔn nsɛm;"

column2: "na hɔn a wotsiee no nyina
column3: ne ntseasee nye ne mbuae yɛɛ hɔn nwanwa."

column2: "Na wohun no no
column3: hɔn ho boow hɔn
column4: na ne na see no dɛ
column6: na ɔyɛ dɛn na enye hɛn edzi no dɛm yi? Hwɛ
column7: w'egya nye emi dze yaw na ahwehwɛ wo."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom hwehwɛɛ me ayɛ dɛn? Ana hom nnyim dɛ otwar dɛ metsena m'Egya fie?"

column2: "Na hɔn dze
column3: wɔanntse asɛm a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn no ase."

column2: "Na ɔnye hɔn sii mu kɔr Nazarɛt
column3: na ɔbrɛɛ noho adze maa hɔn; na ne na dze
column4: ɔdze nsɛm yi nyina siei wɔ n'akoma mu."

column2: "Na Jesus nyinii wɔ nyansa nye honandua mu
column3: na onyaa enyimpa wɔ Nyankopɔn nye nyimpa enyim."
